title: Is artificial intelligence taking jobs in Hampton Roads?
description: Panelists at Virginia Peninsula Chamber's “Harnessing AI for Hampton Roads’ Future” program at the Holiday Inn near City Center at Oyster Point on Thursday addressed guarding against security issues, maintaining data accuracy, advocating for data literacy and preparing workforces for changing roles or jobs that don’t currently exist.
content:
Is artificial intelligence coming for your job? Peninsula experts representing health care, maritime and higher education shared their views on the use of AI in their fields and how it will evolve.

title: AI Clash Opens Rift Between Trump, MAGA Base
description: A new battle is brewing within the conservative movement as President Donald Trump’s strong push for rapid artificial intelligence expansion is prompting warnings from some of his longtime allies, The Washington Post reported Sunday.
content: A new battle is emerging inside the conservative movement as President Donald Trump's full-throttle support for the rapid expansion of artificial intelligence is drawing warnings from some of his own longtime allies, The Washington Post reported Sund... [2969 chars]

title: Whitehall delegates to AI bots like Humphrey
description: The dream of artificial intelligence being a productivity ‘game changer’ is now in doubt
content:
A year ago, Sir Keir Starmer said artificial intelligence would be a “game changer” that would make public services work better and civil servants more productive. So far, the jury is out.

title: This Controversial AI Feature Is Back With iOS 26
description: One of the most controversial Artificial Intelligence features included in iOS is back in the latest revision, but Apple warns it may still not be perfect.
content: Apple launched iOS 26 in September 2025, along with a slew of updates for the mobile operating system, while also quietly removing AI summaries. This feature originally launched with the iOS 18.1 update in October 2024, but Apple removed it for news ... [2247 chars]

title: ‘Rich Dad’ R.Kiyosaki warns these 2 sectors to crash after AI wipes out jobs
description: Bestselling author Robert Kiyosaki has issued a warning about the disruptive impact of artificial intelligence (AI) on the global economy.
content:

title: Global Compact Vision: Modi's Call for Responsible AI Use
description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi advocates for a global agreement to prevent misuse of artificial intelligence, stressing its development should be human-centric. At the G20 Summit, he emphasized a shift towards global, open-source technologies and announced the AI Impact Summit in 2026 to promote equitable AI benefits.
content: In a proactive move, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has made a compelling appeal for a worldwide agreement to curb the misuse of artificial intelligence, emphasizing its development should pivot towards human-centric applications rather than finance-ce... [588 chars]

title: G20 Summit: PM Modi calls for global compact on AI to prevent misuse
description: PM Narendra Modi has called for a global compact to prevent misuse of artificial intelligence and made a strong pitch for critical technologies to be human-centric.
content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Sunday called for a global compact to prevent misuse of artificial intelligence and made a strong pitch for critical technologies to be human-centric, instead of finance-centric.

title: Governments must tackle job concerns amid global AI excitement, investments: PM Wong
description: Speaking at the G20 Summit in Johannesburg, Singapore Prime Minister Lawrence Wong urged world leaders to harness artificial intelligence for more efficient governance and economic productivity.

title: If you’re not helping employees with AI-xiety, you’re not leading
description: Workers are anxious about artificial intelligence. It’s on leaders to manage it.
